Posts.Content: Hi I agree with Benniebee63, paint your nails - hides a multitude of sins and if you use a strengthening basecoat, may even help preserve them.  My last chemo was in April and whilst I have ridges on my nails, they are not lifting off anymore.  I am also eating well and supplementing with Vitamin D. Best wishes
